documents.title: Disabling System Integrity Protection
documents.summary: This document explains the necessity of disabling macOS System Integrity Protection for yabai and provides step-by-step instructions for both Intel and Apple Silicon architectures.

documents.title: Installing Yabai (from HEAD)
documents.summary: This document provides instructions for installing and updating the development version of yabai on macOS, including details on codesigning, accessibility permissions, and scripting addition setup.

documents.title: Installing Yabai (latest Release)
documents.summary: This document provides comprehensive instructions for installing, updating, and configuring yabai on macOS, including specific steps for permissions and scripting additions.

documents.title: Tips And Tricks
documents.summary: A collection of practical tips, scripts, and troubleshooting steps for optimizing the yabai tiling window manager on macOS. It explains how to handle configuration management, automate updates, and refine window behavior.

documents.title: Uninstalling Yabai
documents.summary: This document provides a comprehensive set of commands and steps to completely uninstall the yabai window manager and remove all associated configuration, service, and temporary files from a macOS system.

documents.title: Home
documents.summary: This document introduces yabai, a tiling window manager for macOS, outlining its features, system requirements, installation caveats, and a quickstart guide for new users.

documents.title: Commands
documents.summary: This document provides a detailed reference for the yabai message passing interface and specific commands used to manage displays, spaces, and windows on macOS.

documents.title: Configuration
documents.summary: This document provides a comprehensive guide to configuring the yabai window manager for macOS, detailing setup procedures, tiling behaviors, and user interface customizations.

documents.title: Yabai Documentation
documents.summary: This document is the official man page for yabai, providing complete reference documentation for the tiling window manager including CLI options, configuration settings, display/space/window commands, query system, rules, and signals.
